chart_description: The 'groups.preads' chart displays the average number of kilobytes per second (KiB/s) that all processes in the group 'root' read (from) the hard disk. This chart can help identify which user groups are consuming the most disk reads.

dimension_descriptions.netdata: This is a system dimension that indicates the source or origin of the data being monitored, in this case, the system itself.
dimension_descriptions.root: This is a group dimension that represents the root user or administrator, which refers to all processes running with superuser privileges. This group can indicate which system-level processes are consuming the most disk reads.
